chapter.text: 79|1|a l laoh sbath nung mea la ai kat del dk yk chivit puok  del kmean chomnue daoy khorkhow .
79|2|ning mea la ai kat del dk yk chivit anak mean chomnue daoy  thnam  .
79|3|ning mea la ai kat del choh pi leumekh yeang luen .
79|4|ning mea la ai kat del d nddae m knea noam prolung anak mean chomnue  chhpaoh towkean thansuokr .
79|5|ning mea la ai kat del riebcham batobanhchea robsa a l laoh .
79|6|now thngai del( meankar phlomtre leuktimuoy) phendei ning phnom  teanglay ronhchuoy yeang khlang( avei  teangoasa trauv vineasa a nd reay) .
79|7|kar phlomtre leuk tipir kaetmeanlaeng  banteabpi leuktimuoy ( avei  teangoasa trauv rsa laengvinh) .
79|8|now thngai noh  duong chetd( robsa puok kmean chomnue) phy nheabnhr .
79|9|kevophnek robsa puokke tomleak choh daoysaar karphyokhlach .
79|10|puokke( puok kmean chomnue) niyeay tha  tae puok yeung pitchea  trauv ban ke banhchoun towkean chivit daem( robsa puok yeung) vinh ryy
79|11|tae( ke pitchea banhchoun towkean chivit daem robsa puok yeung vinh  ryy)  nowpel del puok yeung ban klaycha chhaoeng pouk phoy haey noh
79|12|puokke ban niyeay tiet tha  brasenbae dauchnaoh men noh  kuchea kar vilotralb da khatabng .
79|13|pitabrakd nasa  vea kreante chea kar phlomtre( leuk tipir)  muoy dng bonnaoh .
79|14|pelnoh srabte puokke rsa laengvinh peasapenh phendei .
79|15|rueng robsa mou sa pitchea ban mokadl anak( mou ham meat) ruochhaey  .
79|16|nowpel del mcheasa robsa ke haw ke now e chrolongophnom tou vea  da pisedth .
79|17|chaur anak( mou sa) towkean hvie r aon choh  pitabrakd nasa  ke chea anak bampean .
79|18|chaur anak niyeay( towkean hvie r aon) tha  tae anak chng mean  pheap chreah saat der ryyte
79|19|haey chngaoy khnhom nenam anak towkean mcheasa robsa anak ( a l laoh)  ruoch anak nung kaotakhlach trong der ryyte
79|20|pelnoh  mou sa ban bangheanh aoy hvie r aon kheunh nouv  mou chi hsaa t muoy da thom .
79|21|te ke bercha ban bdeseth  ning ban brachheang towvinh .
79|22|banteabmk  ke ban berokhnang daoy pyeayeam rk lbichakl  brachheang nung mou sa .
79|23|ruoch ke ban bramoul( bracha reasdr robsa ke)  haey ke ban  srek brakeasa .
79|24|ning ban niyeay tha  yeung kuchea mcheasa da khpangkhpasa robsa puok anak .
79|25|dau che  neah  a l laoh ban daktondakamm ke teang nowknong lokey  ning barlok .
79|26|pitabrakd nasa  nowknong rueng noh kuchea merien muoy  samreab anaknea del kaotakhlach a l laoh .
79|27|tae kar bangkeut puok anak( aoy rsa laengvinh sachathmei)lombak  ryyka mekh del yeung ban bangkeut vea ruoch lombak cheang
79|28|trong ban leuk trongtreay robsa vea aoy khpasa  ning ban thveu aoy vea reabasmae .
79|29|haey trong ban thveu aoy reatreikeal robsa vea ngngut  haey trong  kaban b po  ch nh ponlu robsa vea mokvinh der nowpel thngai .
79|30|kraoypi noh mk  trong ban thveu aoy phendei reabasmae .
79|31|trong ban b po  ch nh pi dei nouv tuk robsa vea  ning roukkhcheate robsa vea .
79|32|haey trong ban bangkeut phnom chea snoeng da rungmea
79|33|daembi chea phalobrayoch samreab puok anak  ning satvapahn  robsa puok anak .
79|34|te nowpel del kroh m h nd reay da thom ban mokadl(thngai  barlok) .
79|35|thngai noh mnoussa lok nung nukkheunh nouv ei  v del khuo  l nban  sang kanlongomk .
79|36|haey phleung nork cheu hi m nung trauv ban ke bangheanh aoy kheunh  yeang chbasa champoh anaknea del meulkheunh .
79|37|chamnek e anaknea del ban bampean
79|38|ning sraleanh chaul chetd karorsanow knong lokey( cheang thngai  barlok) noh
79|39|pitabrakd nasa  nork cheu hi m kuchea tilomnow robsa ke .
79|40|rie anaknea del kaotakhlach kar chhr nowchampohmoukh mcheasa  robsa ke  ning ban hamkhat khluon pi kar phleutaphleun noh
79|41|pitabrakd nasa  thansuokr kuchea tilomnow robsa ke .
79|42|puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n) nung suor anak( mou ham meat) ampi thngai  barlok tha  tae vea nung kaetlaeng nowpel na
79|43|anak minmen chea anakdoeng ampi pelvelea robsa vea laey .
79|44|ti b pea  ch b robsa vea  ku meante mcheasa robsa anak te del doeng .
79|45|tampit anak kreante chea anak dasatuen promean champoh anak  na del khlach vea bonnaoh .
79|46|now thngai del puokke kheunh vea( thngai barlok)  puokke mean  arommo hakbeidauchchea minban rsanow knong lokey nih laey  leuklengte muoy lngeach  ryy muoy pruk bonnaoh .
